DOC.brief_summary: A 104-week , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , multi-center Phase IIIb study compare effect treatment rosuvastatin 40 mg atorvastatin 80 mg atherosclerotic disease burden measure intravascular ultrasound patient coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: CRESTOR Athero Imaging Head Head IVUS Study
DOC.criteria: Clinical indication coronary angiography Angiographic evidence Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD ) , define least 1 lesion native coronary artery > 20 % reduction lumen diameter visual estimation Left main coronary artery must < =50 % reduction lumen diameter visual estimation LDLC > 100 mg/dL ( 2.6 mmol/L ) patient statin therapy past 4 week ; LDLC > 80mg/dL ( 2.08mmol/L ) patient therapy past 4 week Use certain lipidlowering medication 3 month within previous 12 month . Longer period treatment permit potential effect therapy coronary atherosclerosis . Patients symptoms consistent moderate great severity Congestive Heart Failure ( CHF ) . Clinically significant heart disease , opinion Principal Investigator ( designee ) , likely require coronary bypass surgery , cardiac transplantation , surgical repair and/or replacement course study
